channel.title: Client Failure
channel.description:
Hi I have windows 7 on my new laptop with 64 bit os and when i run a sever then log in using the client soon as i move a little bit it just closes its self
i have tryed changing the bat files to exe and it still doesnt work coul some one please help me thanks a lot

item.title: Client Failure
item.dc:creator: @Project_Realm Project Realm
item.description:
@Project_Realm wrote:

I’ve heard from several people that having a 64 bit system will mess up RS private servers. However, a quick search on Google found this video:

I didn’t look at it myself, but MAYBE it could work for you.

Read full topic
